unnormalised: Hey guys, great discussion on training! Back in IIT, our coach, Dr. Sharma, had us running 5 km every morning. Then it was all about building strength. Remember that grueling push-up routine? Some even did yoga at dawn, like my neighbour, Mrs. Iyer. Found a 1000 sq ft gym near my place for Rs. 5000/month. Worth it, I think! Keeps me prepped for badminton every weekend.
normalised: Hey guys, great discussion on training! Back in I I T, our coach, Doctor Sharma, had us running five kilometer every morning. Then it was all about building strength. Remember that grueling push-up routine? Some even did yoga at dawn, like my neighbor, Missus Iyer. Found a one thousand square feet gym near my place for rupee five thousand per month.
